programme.title: Dead Shot
programme.desc: When a border ambush goes wrong, a retired Irish paramilitary witnesses the fatal shooting of his pregnant wife by an SAS officer. After outwitting the SAS, now wounded, and presumed dead, he escapes, taking his revenge to the dark and paranoid streets of 1970's London. programme.title: Poker Face
programme.desc: Tech billionaire and gambler Jake Foley hosts a high-stakes poker game between childhood friends, offering them the chance to win more money than they've ever dreamed of. However, the evening takes a turn when he unveils his elaborate plan seeking revenge for their betrayals, and to play, they will have to give up the one thing they've spent their lives trying to keep - their secrets. As the game unfolds, thieves break in and they must band together to survive a night of terror. programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Unfortunately, he hasn't secured a place on the official British Royal Legion trip to France to the commemorate the 70th anniversary of the D-Day landings. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: Futuristic thriller starring Clive Owen, Julianne Moore and Michael Caine. In 2027, humanity is facing inevitable extinction due to 18 years of infertility and Britain has become a quasi-fascist state. programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: Sci-fi adventure starring Matthew McConaughey and Anne Hathaway. In the mid-21st century, Earth is running out of resources, and humanity is dying. programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror starring Cillian Murphy and Naomie Harris. When bike courier Jim wakes from a coma in a deserted London hospital, he discovers that a highly contagious virus has turned most of the population of Britain into murderous maniacs. In constant fear of his life, he joins three other survivors on a desperate journey to find sanctuary from the infected hordes. n Danny Boyle - Director Cillian Murphy - Jim Naomie Harris - Selena Christopher Eccleston - Major Henry West Megan Burns - Hannah Brendan Gleeson - Frank Noah Huntley - Mark Luke Mably - Private Clifton Stuart McQuarrie - Sergeant Farrell David Schneider (1) - Scientist.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: Black comedy drama starring Sebastian Stan, Renate Reinsve and Adam Pearson. Edward, a struggling actor, undergoes a radical medical procedure to remove the tumours growing on his face. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.desc: Black comedy drama starring Sebastian Stan, Renate Reinsve and Adam Pearson. programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes' immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venom's hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. programme.title: NFL Bitesize
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a week five match in the NFL season, as the Cincinnati Bengals host AFC North rivals Baltimore Ravens, who previously put an unbeaten Buffalo to the sword. (06.10).

programme.title: NFL Bitesize
programme.desc: The Miami Dolphins visit the Houston Texans in week 15 of the NFL. Coming off a bye week, DeMeco Ryans' side will be hoping to maintain a 100% NFL win record over their visitors. (15.12).

programme.title: NFL Bitesize
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as the Washington Commanders welcome division rivals Philadelphia knowing victory could clinch a playoff berth. The Eagles are eyeing the NFC East title. (22.12).

programme.title: NFL Bitesize
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a match-up during week 17 of the 2024 NFL regular season. (29.12).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: NZ v AUS
programme.desc: New Zealand and Australia meet during the sixth round of the 2024 Rugby Championship. The All Blacks fought hard to secure a 31-28 win in Sydney last week. (28.09).

programme.title: My Icon: Martin Offiah
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, former rugby league superstar Martin Offiah discusses the individuals that have inspired him in his life and career.

programme.title: NRL: Men's State Of Origin#1
programme.desc: The 2025 Ampol State of Origin Series kicks off at the home of the Maroons as Suncorp Stadium hosts game one between Queensland and New South Wales. (28.05).

programme.title: NRL: Men's State Of Orign #2
programme.desc: The State of Origin Series continues with game two between Queensland and New South Wales. (18.06).

programme.title: Darts Gold: Matchplay Final 2005
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic darts matches. Here is Colin Lloyd against John Part in the final of the 2005 World Matchplay.

programme.title: Darts Gold: Grand Slam Final 2012
programme.desc: A chance to relive classic darts matches. Here is Michael van Gerwen against Raymond van Barneveld in the final of the 2012 Grand Slam of Darts at the Wolverhampton Civic Hall.

programme.title: Lions Legends: Sir Ian McGeechan
programme.desc: British & Irish Lions legend Sir Ian McGeechan remembers his time with the team. The former Scottish international fly-half enjoyed series victories both as a player and as a coach.

programme.title: Lions Legends: McBride
programme.desc: ... Willie John McBride. Willie John McBride remembers his time touring with the British & Irish Lions. McBride travelled on five tours with the Lions, making 17 appearances.

programme.title: Lions Legends: Calder
programme.desc: Finlay Calder remembers his time touring with the British & Irish Lions. Calder was the only man in the 20th century to captain the Lions to victory after losing the opening test match.

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: AUS v ARG
programme.desc: The opening round of the 2024 Rugby Championship as Joe Schmidt's Australia host Rassie Erasmus' reigning world champions South Africa at Suncorp Stadium in Brisbane. (10.08).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: AUS v NZ
programme.desc: During round five of the 2024 Rugby Championship, Australia and New Zealand go head to head. The last meeting between the two ended in Australian defeat as the All Blacks won 23-20. (21.09).

programme.title: Tri-Nations Rugby: NZ v AUS
programme.desc: New Zealand and Australia meet during the sixth round of the 2024 Rugby Championship. The All Blacks fought hard to secure a 31-28 win in Sydney last week. (28.09).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: Josh Allen and the Buffalo Bills face Lamar Jackson's Baltimore Ravens in the divisional round. The Bills haven't been to the Super Bowl since losing their fourth in a row in 1994. (19.01).

programme.title: NFL Highlights
programme.desc: After knocking off the Super Bowl favourites, the Washington Commanders end a 33-year wait to compete for the NFC title as Jayden Daniels and co go to the Philadelphia Eagles. (26.01).

programme.title: NFL Bitesize
programme.desc: A match from opening weekend of the NFL regular season as Kirk Cousins and the Atlanta Falcons get underway against the Pittsburgh Steelers. (08.09).

programme.title: NFL Bitesize

programme.desc: Bitesize highlights from a match during the 2024 NFL season, as Derek Carr and New Orleans take on Jalen Hurts' Philadelphia Eagles. (22.09).

programme.title: Lions Tour 2021: Sth Africa
programme.desc: South Africa lock horns with the British & Irish Lions in the second Test of the series in Cape Town. The Lions lead the series 1-0 after a hard-fought 22-17 win in the opener.

programme.title: Lions Tour 2021: Sth Africa
programme.desc: The British & Irish Lions tour of South Africa ends with the third and final Test against the Springboks in Cape Town. This is the decider after South Africa won the second match.
